question: Whcih of the following revolutionaries refused to drink the given milk on the eve of his execution and said “Now, I shall take my mother’s milk only “?
explanation: Ram Prasad Bismil was an Indian revolutionary who participated in the Mainpuri conspiracy of 1918, and the Kakori conspiracy of 1925. He refused to drink the given milk on the eve of his execution and said “Now, I shall take my mother’s milk only “.
